rewrite1:
Please make the following adjustments to the formatting within the Word document:

- For the second paragraph, ensure there is no spacing before it begins and embolden all the text within.
- In the sixth paragraph, italicize the entire text and adjust the right margin so that it indents negatively by 1 cm.
- In regards to the eighth paragraph, set the outline level to 6, alter the text color to the hexadecimal value #FAFAD2, and highlight the text using a lime shade. Additionally, ensure that any italic formatting previously applied to this paragraph is removed.
rewrite2:

In the sixth paragraph, italicize the text and adjust the right indent to -1 cm.

For the eighth paragraph, assign it an Outline Level 6, alter the text color to the hexadecimal code #FAFAD2, highlight it in lime, and ensure the italic style is turned off.
rewrite3:
